title: Umbrella Academy Klaus Vinyl Figure
body_html:
"First of all, it's not a cult" Now, we KNOW it's not a cult, but when Klaus strolled into Youtooz for his debut, we couldn't help but join him! Standing at 4.4 inches tall with his hands raised showing off the 'Hello' and 'Good Bye' tattoos on his palms, his face flashes with a look of concern as a thick moustache sits above his mouth and a long goatee hangs down in front of a bare chest and tattooed stomach. With a mane of flowing brown hair that falls down past his shoulders, he wears an open billowing white coat with a pale green trim, striped grey and beige pants and white boots. The exterior of his packaging sees a slightly overwhelmed Klaus being praised by his 'not a cult'. While the interior of his packaging is a stark black covered in red and white flying bullets, knives, umbrellas and crosshairs which continues onto the protective sleeve where his figure can be seen through the large clear window at the packaging's front.

  • Height 4.4"
  • This collectible ships in a matte, embossed, protective outer sleeve and a custom sized plastic protector for maximum protection during shipping

featured_image.alt: Umbrella Academy Klaus YouTooz Vinyl Figure
